author: grahamd
msg: Further updates to documentation for the apache.import_module() function.

author: dreid
msg: Catch the fact we now have an image and don't set it as the default

author: gnodet
msg: AMQ-1084: Allow o.a.a.pool to support XA transactions
Also enhance the pooled ConnectionFactory to reuse several connections.
Fix the lastUsed timestamp on the ConnectionPool to avoid discarding reusable connections.

author: grahamd
msg: (MODPYTHON-143) Allow just '~' to be used as a directory in the module
importer search path to refer to the handler root directory.
